classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, and GE Elective. Upper-Division C and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). NOTE: GE Area B2 is included in concentrations. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Select one of the following: MATH161, MATH141, MATH221.

Consultation with advisor is recommended prior to selecting approved electives; bear in mind your selections may impact pursuit of post-baccalaureate studies and/or goals. Approved electives: minimum 13 units required. A maximum of 8 units of foreign language may be counted toward approved electives.
